extensionAttribute.displayName: OS - Disable SSH Login For Accounts With Blank Passwords
extensionAttribute.description: This extension attribute will read the "PermitEmptyPasswords" setting in the file /etc/sshd_config.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredResult="PermitEmptyPasswords no" result=`cat /private/etc/sshd_config | grep "$desiredResult" | tail -1` if [ "$result" == "$desiredResult" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($result)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" fi
